title: What do mastery 6/7 get you?
body: so I finally got my first mastery 6 token, but I realized how expensive it was. I was wondering what you actually get for the upgrade since it costs so much essence? Is it just being able to say you have it?

replies.body: lol it's only 500 blue essence my guy
I have 2 champ shards, and both of them dont add up to 500.

Bragging rights and just good ol' cosmetics.

As in, the emote itself is pretty much a cosmetic after all.

Mystery coins are a thing now, so you can potentially get the appropriate champ shard that way (for ip), or lack that you could disenchant those to get the essence somewhat easier than relying on chests.

But yes, it's just a bigger emote, fancier loading screen badge thing, and some extra decoration around your character icon in the kill messages.
